features.name: Tongue Of The Sun And Moon
Tongue Of The Sun And Moon
Rogue Advanced Talents and Ninja Master Tricks
Believer's Boon
features.enabledFormula: all(@wis_score>=13,"alignment must be within one step of your deity's")

features.name: Believer's Hands
features.enabledFormula: all(@wis_score>=13,@feat:believers_boon,@alignment:lg,"alignment must be within one step of your deity's")

features.name: Blessed Striker
features.enabledFormula: all(@bab>=11,@trait:divine_spellcaster[Divine spellcaster],"alignment must be within one step of your deity's")

features.name: Energy Channel
features.enabledFormula: all(@ability:channel_energy#warpriest,"Air, Earth, Fire, or Water domain or blessing")

features.name: Intimidating Performance
features.enabledFormula: any("Ability to start a performance (or raging song) as a move action",@ability:bardic_performance,@ability:raging_song#skald)
